tool_description: Will take a String and return an array of all emails contained within.
name: Email Extraction
title: Email Extraction

api_list.name: Email Query
api_list.description: Extracts all emails as an array contained in string
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
